headline: TD Cowen Says This Memory Chip Maker Is One of the Best Stocks to Buy for 2026
summary: As demand for memory chips surges due to AI, TD Cowen sees a lot of potential in Applied Materials stock.

headline: Veeco Instruments: Is It Worth Hanging Around, Or Is It Time To Go?
